Constructors

RelativeInterval(int)

How many steps the interval covers. 0 = Unison, 2 = Third up, -4 = fifth down.

public RelativeInterval(int steps)

Parameters

steps int

Properties

Direction

The direction of the interval. 1 = up, -1 = down.

int

Interval

The interval size disregarding octave and direction.

How many octaves the interval reaches rounded down.

Methods

GetSemitones()

Returns the amount of semitones in the interval. Interval going down will have negative semitones. Semitones are based on the major scale.

public int GetSemitones()

int

The semitones in the interval.
